turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello! Could you order me a coffee drink from Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I sure can! Where would you like to pick it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: In Palmer please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, Fred Meyer or Carrs Starbucks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to get it from Carrs at 664 W Evergreen please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, what drink would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could I get a Caramel Macchiato please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, what size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will get a venti.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, would you like that hot or iced?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like it iced.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, do you want whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I would like whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like regular milk, or a substitution such as soy, almond, or coconut?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just regular milk please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, any other additions you'd like me to add?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could I get extra caramel in the cup?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Absolutely! Does that finalize your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I believe it does.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your drink is on order now! It will be ready for pickup shortly, and I've sent the receipt to your mobile device via text!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you so much! Talk to you later.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Goodbye!
